title: #libre
subtitle: aka Free Software
description:
Software made open not only for the convenience of openess but for Freedom as an ideal (cf the [Free Software Foundation](https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-software-intro.html) definition). [VRM](/tags/vrm) is an extension of those principle of liberty in the sphere of commercial conversations. [P2P-RM](/tags/p2p-rm) aim to continue this struggle for Freedom in the field of access to information on resources/products.

There are growing evidences that, long before [Richard Stallman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Stallman), the Free Software movement was started by William Wallace:
